Some Reasons To Improve Your Santa Ana Website

Santa Ana Is A Huge Place With A Lot of People, Optimizing Your Website Will Help Increase Local Visibility

Covering 25 Square miles of land with a population of about 310,000 people Santa Ana is one of the most populated cities in the entire United States.

Santa Ana Has A Lot of People And So Do the Surrounding areas.

Some Interesting Facts About Santa Ana

Below are some interesting facts about Santa Ana from past to present.

Some Of Earliest People In Santa Ana

Some of the first people in the area that is now Santa Ana are the Tonvga people. The Tongva people are a Native American people that have been estimated to be living in the La Basin region anywhere from as early as 30,000 years ago.

How Santa Ana Got It's Name

Santa Ana Got it's name from a Spanish Soldier that was part of the portola expedition.
